title: Ticket #6746: Projection on aucocluster query doesn't work in Python bindings
description: With the xquery() method of the Schedd object in the python bindings, when using the AutoCluster or GroupBy option, the projection argument is ignored. All attributes of the ads are always returned. This is due to a bug in the schedd handling the QUERY_JOB_ADS command. When querying job ads, the Projection attribute of the query ad can be a single string of comma-delimited names or a ClassAd list of string names. When querying with the AutoCluster or GroupBy options, only the single string form is recognized. The python bindings use the list form.
